TopicTitle: KSP Site and Forums are back!

Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone.

As you know, we had some troubles with our server because we exceeded our bandwith. Well, now everything is back to normal and you can keep sharing whatever you want on these forums again.

Excuse us for the technical problems, but now WE'RE BACK!!

Cheers

Hello new user here.

First of all good to see the forum online

When i got this game the forums where down.

glad to see them online now i can mingle with my fellow KSP(ers?)

great game looking forward to all the updates

cheers feldo

Finally, my DNS updated and I can get into the Forums again!!

Cheers
Looks like you guys got off to a pretty Kerbalesque start! ;D

Tell me about it! Yesterday I was able to log in for 10 minutes, then the DNS reverted back to the old host again...

Now I managed to get in again through a proxy server... not the best of solutions for getting into your own forum

Well, at least I can post again.

Cheers
